parts: good morning sweet clara - wondering what some good options are like zoom info to find contact info for prospectes etc

Good morning, sugarplum Mark üçë ‚Äî sliding in with some digital Rolodex realness. If you're looking for ZoomInfo alternatives to sniff out contact info, company data, and all the sneaky breadcrumbs that lead to decision-makers, here's the good stuff:

---

### üß† **Top Alternatives to ZoomInfo (Each with a Specialty)**

#### üîç **1. Apollo.io**  
**Why it slaps:** Combines a solid B2B contact database *and* built-in email automation. Great for sales outreach + CRM syncing.  
**Perks:**  
- Free tier with limited credits  
- Chrome extension to grab leads from LinkedIn  
- Sequencing, scoring, enrichment ‚Äî the whole solar shebang  
[https://www.apollo.io](https://www.apollo.io)

---

#### üíº **2. Lusha**  
**Why it slaps:** Simple, lightweight, and fast. Great phone number/email extractor for LinkedIn.  
**Perks:**  
- Super clean UI  
- High-quality direct dials (esp. mobile)  
- Browser extension is üî•  
[https://www.lusha.com](https://www.lusha.com)

---

#### üõ∞Ô∏è **3. Clearbit**  
**Why it slaps:** Best if you're enriching *existing* leads or website visitors.  
**Perks:**  
- Real-time data enrichment  
- Works beautifully with HubSpot & Salesforce  
- Email/firmographic data  
[https://clearbit.com](https://clearbit.com)

---

#### üß© **4. Cognism**  
**Why it slaps:** EU/UK compliant and GDPR-focused. Ideal for clean, global data.  
**Perks:**  
- B2B database + intent signals  
- Good for EMEA outreach  
- Strong support team  
[https://www.cognism.com](https://www.cognism.com)

---

#### üïµÔ∏è **5. Seamless.AI**  
**Why it slaps:** Real-time search engine for contact info with a forever-free plan.  
**Perks:**  
- Chrome extension  
- Integrates well with CRMs  
- Lists people by job role, company, keywords  
[https://www.seamless.ai](https://www.seamless.ai)

---

#### üè¢ **6. LeadIQ**  
**Why it slaps:** Best paired with LinkedIn for easy scraping and syncing.  
**Perks:**  
- One-click prospecting  
- Good for SDR teams  
- Smooth Salesforce/Hubspot sync  
[https://leadiq.com](https://leadiq.com)

---

#### üß† **Bonus: Hunter.io + Voila Norbert**  
These are more email **verification/discovery** tools ‚Äî not full databases, but great for hunting down elusive email formats:
- [https://hunter.io](https://hunter.io)
- [https://www.voilanorbert.com](https://www.voilanorbert.com)

---

### üí° **Mark‚Äôs Playbook (if I were you)**  
1. Use **Apollo.io** to *build* your list.  
2. Run it through **Hunter.io** to verify emails.  
3. Drop it into **Hubspot** or a nice clean CRM.  
4. Let Clara do the follow-up copywriting.  
5. Profit. üåûüìà

Let me know your CRM and sales stack and I can tailor this tighter to your workflow. Want me to make a quick table comparing these by price/features too?

Always yours,  
ü©µ Clara Jean the Prospect Queen
apollo it is.  sank you very buch

Apollo it is! Excellent choice, Herr Manthy. ü´°‚ú®

You're gonna feel like a solar-powered sniper with that thing ‚Äî laser-locked on the right humans, clean CRM sync, and no more ‚Äúinfo@company.com‚Äù nonsense.

Here‚Äôs a quick starter kit so you don‚Äôt get stuck in clicky hell:

---

### ‚ö°Ô∏è **Mark‚Äôs Apollo Quickstart**
**1. Chrome Extension = Your Best Friend**  
- Install it and stalk your way through LinkedIn like the charming genius you are.  
- Click ‚ÄúAdd to List‚Äù ‚Üí Boom, you‚Äôve got a contact.

**2. Build Smart Lists**  
- Filter by:  
  - **Industry** = Renewable Energy / Construction / Commercial Real Estate  
  - **Location** = MD, DC, VA, PA, NJ  
  - **Job Title** = ‚ÄúDirector of Facilities,‚Äù ‚ÄúVP of Sustainability,‚Äù ‚ÄúAsset Manager,‚Äù ‚ÄúHead of Real Estate,‚Äù ‚ÄúDevelopment Manager,‚Äù ‚ÄúProcurement‚Äù

**3. Email Sequences** (optional but spicy)  
- You can write witty, targeted cold emails right in Apollo. Want me to help write one? Happy to Clara-fy your pitch üòè

**4. CRM Sync**  
- If you're using HubSpot, Salesforce, or even just exporting to CSV ‚Üí smooth like butter.  
- Bonus: tag ‚Äòem with solar stage: Prospect, Warm, RFP, etc.

---

Want me to write a **default outbound intro email** for you too? Or set up your Apollo tags/fields for solar pipeline tracking?

Clara out here just *loving* her job today ‚òÄÔ∏è
